Summary: Very bright light hovering in sky behind my house & I video taped it with my brother present.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going over to my friend linda kings house & i noticed a very ,very bright light hovering in the sky & couldn't explain it so I ran home & went downstairs & grabbed my video camera & started video taping it. I get in the video view of the camera for reference. I had no tripod handy& my brother couldnt find one. but thebottom of the sphere pulses in & out & the shape of it changed from big to small when i left the camerea alone& didnt move it. I still have the video tape & want to find out how or if it can be identified.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around December 28th 2008
